features.name: Rage
features.description: Enter a rage to gain +2 damage and resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage

features.name: Unarmored Defense
features.description: AC = 10 + DEX modifier + CON modifier when not wearing armor

features.name: Reckless Attack
features.description: Attack with advantage but enemies have advantage against you until your next turn

features.name: Fighting Style
features.description: Choose a fighting style: Archery, Defense, Dueling, Great Weapon Fighting, Protection, or Two-Weapon Fighting

features.name: Second Wind
features.description: Use a bonus action to regain 1d10 + fighter level hit points once per short rest

features.name: Action Surge
features.description: Take an additional action on your turn once per short rest

features.name: Sneak Attack
features.description: Deal extra damage when you have advantage or when an enemy is within 5 feet of an ally

features.name: Cunning Action
features.description: Use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action

features.name: Expertise
features.description: Choose two skill proficiencies to double your proficiency bonus

features.name: Spellcasting
features.description: Cast spells using Intelligence as your spellcasting ability

features.name: Arcane Recovery
features.description: Regain spell slots during a short rest once per day

features.name: Arcane Tradition
features.description: Choose a school of magic specialization
